entry.value: # data input%%00010rframe <- knime.in%%00010rowID_col <- rownames(rframe)%%00010%%00010# define the variables%%00010d.val <- knime.flow.in[["d_value"]]%%00010w.val <- knime.flow.in[["w_value"]]%%00010imp.method <- knime.flow.in[["imp_method"]]%%00010%%00010# create empty dataframe%%00010df_imputed <- data.frame(matrix(NA, nrow = nrow(rframe), ncol = ncol(rframe)))%%00010%%00010# set seed to make it reproducible%%00010set.seed(42)%%00010%%00010if (imp.method == "column-wise") {%%00010%%00009%%00009for (i in 1:ncol(rframe)) {%%00010%%00009%%00009tmp <- rframe[,i]%%00009%%00009%%00009# take i-column from dataset%%00010%%00009%%00009NA_count <- sum(is.na(tmp))%%00009# count the number of missing values in the vector%%00010%%00009%%00009vec_tmp <- na.omit(tmp)%%00009%%00009# create helper vector without NA values for sd+mean calculation%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009mean_imp <- mean(vec_tmp) - d.val*sd(vec_tmp)%%00009# compute mean for r-norm based on Perseus %%00010%%00009%%00009sd_imp <- w.val*sd(vec_tmp)%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009# compute standard deviation for r-norm%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009tmp_impute <- tmp%%00010%%00009%%00009# replace missing values column-wise with random draws from the distribution%%00010%%00009%%00009tmp_impute[is.na(tmp_impute)] <- rnorm(NA_count, mean_imp, sd_imp)%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009df_imputed[,i] <- tmp_impute %%00009# replace original column with imputed one%%00010}} else {%%00010%%00009%%00009tmp <- rframe%%00010%%00009%%00009NA_count <- sum(is.na(tmp))%%00009%%00009%%00009# count the number of missing values in the vector%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009mean_tmp <- mean(na.omit(unlist(tmp))) %%00009# compute mean of whole dataframe%%00010%%00009%%00009sd_tmp <- sd(na.omit(unlist(tmp)))%%00009%%00009# compute SD of whole dataframe%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009mean_imp <- mean_tmp - d.val*sd_tmp%%00009# compute mean for r-norm based on Perseus %%00010%%00009%%00009sd_imp <- w.val*sd_tmp%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009# compute standard deviation for r-norm%%00010%%00010%%00009%%00009tmp_impute <- tmp%%00010%%00009%%00009tmp_impute[is.na(tmp_impute)] <- rnorm(NA_count, mean_imp, sd_imp)%%00010%%00009%%00009df_imputed <- tmp_impute %%00009# replace original column with imputed one%%00010%%00009%%00009}%%00010%%00010%%00010%%00010# Write out the dataframe%%00010knime.out <- data.frame(df_imputed)%%00010colnames(knime.out) <- colnames(rframe)%%00010knime.out$rowID_col <- rowID_col

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
